DOC.brief_summary: Phase 3 study to compare treatment with ITCA 650 to sitagliptin when added to metformin monotherapy in patients with type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate ITCA 650 Compared to Sitagliptin as add-on Therapy for the Treatment of Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: HbA1c between 7.5% 10.5% on metformin monotherapy BMI between 25 & 45 kg/m2 taking thiazolidinedione, sulfonylurea, DPP4, exenatide, alpha glucosidase inhibitors, meglitinides or insulin within last 3 months history of pancreatitis
